activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.MainActivity
activities.summary: MainActivity serves as the main interface for managing contacts, favorites, and groups in a tab-based UI. It handles contact permissions, manages dynamic fragments, provides options to sort/filter contacts, allows changing view type and column count, displays 'What's New' dialogs, launches dialer, settings, and about screens, and supports shortcut creation for adding new contacts.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: A brief summary of the activity's functionality.For example:this activity is used for setting, which include set theme,color,size.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.ViewContactActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Serves as the main container for organizing the layout of the contact view.
Enables scrolling through the contact's details if they exceed the screen size.
Toggles between normal and large photo view when clicked.
Marks or unmarks the contact as a favorite.
Initiates an action to send an email to the contact.
Initiates a call to the contact.
Starts composing an SMS message to the contact.
Shows the full name of the contact along with a nickname if available.
Navigates to edit the contact from its source (e.g., Google, SIM card).
Copies the address to the clipboard upon long-press.
Opens the website URL associated with the contact.
Copies the instant messaging handle of the contact on long-press.
Displays event-related information such as birthdays or anniversaries.
Shows the group(s) the contact belongs to, such as family or friends.
Marks or unmarks a number as the primary number for the contact.
Initiates a call to the selected phone number.
Initiates sending an email to the selected email address.

activities.summary: The ViewContactActivity is used to display and manage detailed information about a contact. It supports viewing contact details such as name, phone numbers, emails, addresses, notes, organization, and more. Users can perform actions like marking a contact as favorite, setting a custom ringtone, editing or deleting the contact, and sharing it. The activity also allows interactions like calling, sending SMS, or email directly from the UI.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.GroupContactsActivity

layouts.name: R.menu.xx.xml (menu file containing send_sms_to_group, send_email_to_group, assign_ringtone_to_group)

dynamic_properties.effect: Hosts UI components such as the toolbar, RecyclerView, and FAB to ensure proper layout hierarchy.
Handles menu options like sending SMS/email to the group and assigning a ringtone.
Wraps the RelativeLayout that contains the placeholder text and RecyclerView.
Groups UI elements like placeholder texts and RecyclerView for better layout management.
Shows 'This group is empty' message when there are no contacts in the current group.
Displays 'Add contacts' message below the placeholder to guide the user when the group is empty.
Provides fast scrolling functionality for the RecyclerView to quickly navigate through the list of contacts.
Displays the list of contacts belonging to the selected group using a RecyclerView adapter.
Opens a dialog to select contacts for adding or removing from the group.

activities.summary: This activity, GroupContactsActivity, manages the display and interaction of contacts within a specific contact group. It allows users to add or remove contacts from the group, assign ringtones, send emails or SMS in bulk to the group, and manage other related actions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.InsertOrEditContactActivity
activities.summary: This activity, InsertOrEditContactActivity, is used for inserting new contacts or editing existing ones. It supports launching in different modes such as selecting a contact (ACTION_PICK) or creating/editing a contact. The UI includes tabs for organizing contacts and favorites, with options to filter and sort the contact list. It interacts with external activities for contact creation and editing and handles result callbacks appropriately.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.ContactActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for managing contact details, including actions such as setting custom ringtones, sharing contacts, sending emails or SMS, deleting contacts, and displaying or selecting contact photos. It also provides functionality to handle user interactions related to contact properties like email types, address types, and IM protocols.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.SettingsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: navigates to color customization activity to change app colors.
enables or disables English language display and restarts the app.
opens a system dialog or intent to change the app's language.
presents options to select font size and updates the configuration accordingly.
shows a dialog to manage which contact fields are visible in the app.
enables or disables automatic merging of duplicate contacts.
toggles the call confirmation feature on or off.

static_properties.text: Show private contacts to Simple Dialer, Simple SMS Messenger and Simple Calendar Pro

dynamic_properties.effect: controls whether private contacts are shown across SimpleMobileTools apps.
opens a dialog to manage which tabs are visible on the main screen.
displays a dialog to set the default tab that opens when the app starts.
allows selection of the action (call, view, edit) triggered by clicking a contact.
shows or hides the dialpad button on the main screen.

static_properties.text: Show a dialpad button on the main screen
Show only contacts with phone numbers

dynamic_properties.effect: filters contact list to show only those with phone numbers.
shows or hides thumbnails for contacts in the list view.
controls whether phone numbers are displayed next to contact names.
switches name display order between 'First Name Surname' and 'Surname First Name'.
enables or disables automatic backups of contacts.
opens a dialog to manage and schedule automatic backups.
initiates the export of contacts to a VCF file chosen by the user.
starts the process to import contacts from a selected VCF file.

static_properties.text: Show private contacts to Simple Dialer, Simple SMS Messenger and Simple Calendar Pro
Show a dialpad button on the main screen
Show only contacts with phone numbers

activities.summary: This activity serves as the settings interface for managing contact-related configurations. It allows users to customize appearance, behavior, backup settings, import/export contacts, and manage visibility of tabs and contact fields.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: The SimpleActivity serves as a base activity for handling common functionalities across screens, such as managing themes, preferences, and providing utility methods for UI components.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.contacts.pro.activities.EditContactActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: holds UI components for editing an event associated with the contact (e.g., birthday or anniversary).
allows user to edit the event date or reset the event.
removes the specific event entry from the contact.
opens a dialog to select or customize the type of event (e.g., birthday, anniversary).
holds UI components for editing a phone number associated with the contact.
allows the user to enter or edit a phone number.
marks the selected phone number as the default (primary) contact number.
opens a dialog to select or customize the type of phone number (e.g., mobile, home, work).
holds UI components for editing an email address associated with the contact.
allows the user to enter or edit an email address.
opens a dialog to select or customize the type of email (e.g., home, work).
holds UI components for editing a postal address associated with the contact.
allows the user to enter or edit a postal address.
opens a dialog to select or customize the type of address (e.g., home, work).

activities.summary: The EditContactActivity is used for editing or creating a new contact. It allows users to input and manage various contact details such as name, phone numbers, email addresses, postal addresses, IMs, events, websites, organization details, notes, groups, and contact source. The activity supports functionalities like setting a favorite status, choosing a ringtone, selecting or capturing a photo, and saving the contact data back to the system.
